content: I like the tips, especially the one about setting realistic goals. I think that's where I tend to struggle. I've been using a planner to schedule my writing sessions, and it's helped me stay on track. Do you have any suggestions on how to make the most out of my planner, like any specific layouts or templates I could use? By the way, I wrote most of "Lost in the Woods" on my phone's Notes app during the bus ride back home from the camping trip, and then transferred it to my laptop when I got back.
